pages.text: Calling upon the protection of an ancient sun deity, forgotten even in the time of the Druids, this ritual drastically alters the weather & time cycle.$(br2)Rain is dispelled by this ritual, while the length of a day is increased, and the duration of night is shortened.$(br2)In addition, nearby undead, anathema to the sun, will be smote with fire.
$(standing_stones) As a $(bold)tier I$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_divine_protection#multiblock)a single standing stone is required to begin$(). Please see later pages of this entry.

pages.title: Ritual Specifics
pages.text: $(bold)Rain$(): Whether or not rain will be cleared: $(ritual:divine_protection/BOOL/rain).$(br2)$(bold)Time$(): Whether or not time will be adjusted: $(ritual:divine_protection/BOOL/time). Average decrease of night duration is $(ritual:divine_protection/NIGHT/night_reduction). Average increase of day duration is $(ritual:divine_protection/DAY/day_extension).$(br2)
